questions.question: If the contact radius becomes smaller for the same load, the contact pressure will:

explanations.a: Pressure equals load divided by area; a smaller area concentrates the same force, producing higher contact stress.
explanations.b: Pressure equals load divided by area; a smaller area concentrates the same force, producing higher contact stress.
explanations.c: Pressure equals load divided by area; a smaller area concentrates the same force, producing higher contact stress.
